db:abstract.db:para: The QAudioInputSelectorControl class provides an audio input selector media control.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The QAudioInputSelectorControl class provides descriptions of the audio inputs available on a system and allows one to be selected as the audio input of a media service.
The interface name of QAudioInputSelectorControl is org.qt-project.qt.audioinputselectorcontrol/5.0 as defined in QAudioInputSelectorControl_iid.

db:section.db:title: [explicit protected] QAudioInputSelectorControl::QAudioInputSelectorControl(QObject *parent = Q_NULLPTR)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new audio input selector control with the given parent.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QAudioInputSelectorControl::~QAudioInputSelectorControl()
db:section.db:para: Destroys an audio input selector control.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QAudioInputSelectorControl::activeInput() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the name of the currently selected audio input.

db:section.db:title: void QAudioInputSelectorControl::activeInputChanged(const QString &name)
db:section.db:para: Signals that the audio input has changed to name.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QList<QString> QAudioInputSelectorControl::availableInputs() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a list of the names of the available audio inputs.

db:section.db:title: void QAudioInputSelectorControl::availableInputsChanged()
db:section.db:para: Signals that list of available inputs has changed.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QAudioInputSelectorControl::defaultInput() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the name of the default audio input.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QAudioInputSelectorControl::inputDescription(const QString &name) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the description of the input name.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QAudioInputSelectorControl::setActiveInput(const QString &name)
db:section.db:para: Set the active audio input to name.

db:section.db:title: QAudioInputSelectorControl_iid
db:section.db:para: Defines the interface name of the QAudioInputSelectorControl class.
